column4: Multiple collisions in the Lexington area.
Use extreme caution, slow down, and increase following distances.
The ramps and overpasses on New Circle Rd at Versailles Rd and Richmond Rd have been reported to be extremely hazardous.
The roadway is shutdown at this time.
Police are reportedly diverting all northbound traffic onto Winchester Rd.
Inbound Georgetown Rd just past New Circle Rd
I-75N near Exit 108 (Man O War Blvd).
New Circle Rd at Versailles Rd.
Alumni Dr at New Circle Rd.
W Main St at Newtown Pike.
Georgetown Rd at New Circle Rd.
Nicholasville Rd at The Summit and at E Tiverton Way.
Man O War Blvd at Nichols Park Dr.
